question:
you work from home and you a problem with a piece of equipment that you use for your job


write a letter to the shop that supplied the equipment to you.
text: I am writing this letter to explain to you the issue I am facing right now while I am working from home. I am a resident of Acme height society, and If you remember I purchased a wireless mouse from your shop last week.

I have to tell you that I am facing a problem with its battery, it gets drained out in a few hours despite being fully charged, but on the packaging,it's written that  it will work for at least twelve hours. So, I think there is some issue.
So, I would like to request you to exchange that device as soon as possible as it is causing a lot of inconvenience to me. I have to wait a lot during my working hours to charge it repeatedly.
I hope you'll look into this issue asap and give me a new brand new mouse.
